atk-s0510a42:2_0: Chappaññāsame vagge paṭhamāpadāne mahāsamuddaṁ oggayhātiādikaṁ āyasmato yasattherassa apadānaṁ.
atk-s0510a42:2_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto sumedhassa
atk-s0510a42:2_2: bhagavato kāle mahānubhāvo nāgarājā hutvā buddhappamukhaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ attano bhavanaṁ netvā mahādānaṁ
atk-s0510a42:2_5: ekekañca bhikkhuṁ mahaggheneva paccekadussayugena sabbena ca samaṇaparikkhārena.
atk-s0510a42:2_6: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle seṭṭhiputto hutvā mahābodhimaṇḍalaṁ sattahi ratanehi pūjesi.
atk-s0510a42:2_7: Kassapassa bhagavato kāle sāsane pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0510a42:2_8: Evaṁ so sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto amhākaṁ bhagavato kāle bārāṇasiyaṁ mahāvibhavassa seṭṭhino putto hutvā
atk-s0510a42:2_9: sujātāya bhagavato khīrapāyāsaṁ dinnāya seṭṭhidhītāya kucchimhi nibbatti,
atk-s0510a42:2_15: So vassike pāsāde vassike cattāro māse nippurisehi tūriyehi paricārayamāno vasati,
atk-s0510a42:2_17: Hemantike pāsāde cattāro māse suphusitavātapānakavāṭe tattheva paṭivasati.
atk-s0510a42:2_18: Gimhike pāsāde bahukavāṭavātapānajālāhi sampanne tattheva vasati.
atk-s0510a42:2_20: Simbalitulādipuṇṇasabhāve attharitvā tattha upadhānāni kiccāni karoti.
atk-s0510a42:2_21: Evaṁ devaloke devakumāro viya pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitassa samaṅgībhūtassa paricārayamānassa paṭikacceva niddā okkami,
atk-s0510a42:2_24: Atha kho yaso kulaputto paṭikacceva pabujjhitvā addasa sakaṁ parijanaṁ supantaṁ aññissā kacche vīṇaṁ,
atk-s0510a42:2_32: Atha kho yaso kulaputto udānaṁ udānesi –
atk-s0510a42:3_0: Atha kho yaso kulaputto suvaṇṇapādukāyo ārohitvā yena nivesanadvāraṁ tenupasaṅkami,
atk-s0510a42:3_2: ‘‘mā yasassa kulaputtassa koci antarāyamakāsi agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajjāyā’’ti.
atk-s0510a42:3_3: Atha kho yaso kulaputto yena nagaradvāraṁ tenupasaṅkami,
atk-s0510a42:3_5: ‘‘mā yasassa kulaputtassa koci antarāyamakāsi agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajjāyā’’ti.
atk-s0510a42:3_6: Atha kho yaso kulaputto yena isipatanaṁ migadāyo tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0510a42:4_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ paccuṭṭhāya ajjhokāse caṅkamati,
atk-s0510a42:4_1: addasā kho bhagavā yasaṁ kulaputtaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ,
atk-s0510a42:4_2: disvāna caṅkamā orohitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
atk-s0510a42:4_3: Atha kho yaso kulaputto bhagavato avidūre udānaṁ udānesi –
atk-s0510a42:4_6: Atha kho bhagavā yasaṁ kulaputtaṁ etadavoca –
atk-s0510a42:4_13: idaṁ anupassaṭṭha’’nti haṭṭho udaggo suvaṇṇapādukāhi orohitvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
atk-s0510a42:4_15: ekamantaṁ nisinnassa kho yasassa kulaputtassa bhagavā anupubbiṁ kathaṁ kathesi,
atk-s0510a42:4_17: dānakathaṁ sīlakathaṁ saggakathaṁ kāmānaṁ ādīnavaṁ okāraṁ saṁkilesaṁ nekkhamme ānisaṁsaṁ pakāsesi.
atk-s0510a42:4_18: Yadā bhagavā aññāsi yasaṁ kulaputtaṁ kallacittaṁ muducittaṁ vinīvaraṇacittaṁ udaggacittaṁ pasannacittaṁ,
atk-s0510a42:4_20: taṁ pakāsesi dukkhaṁ samudayaṁ nirodhaṁ maggaṁ.
atk-s0510a42:4_21: Seyyathāpi nāma suddhaṁ vatthaṁ apagatakāḷakaṁ sammadeva rajanaṁ paṭiggaṇheyya,
atk-s0510a42:4_22: evameva yasassa kulaputtassa tasmiṁyeva āsane virajaṁ vītamalaṁ dhammacakkhuṁ udapādi –
atk-s0510a42:5_0: Atha kho yasassa kulaputtassa mātā pāsādaṁ abhiruhitvā yasaṁ kulaputtaṁ apassantī yena seṭṭhi gahapati tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a42:5_2: ‘‘putto te gahapati yaso na dissatī’’ti. Atha kho,
atk-s0510a42:5_4: catuddisā assadūte uyyojetvā sāmaṁyeva yena isipatanaṁ migadāyo tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0510a42:5_9: Addasā kho bhagavā seṭṭhiṁ gahapatiṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ,
atk-s0510a42:5_12: yathā seṭṭhi gahapati idha nisinno idha nisinnaṁ yasaṁ kulaputtaṁ na passeyyā’’ti.
atk-s0510a42:5_13: Atha kho bhagavā tathārūpaṁ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkharesi.
atk-s0510a42:5_14: Atha kho seṭṭhi gahapati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami ;
atk-s0510a42:5_18: appeva nāma idha nisinno idha nisinnaṁ yasaṁ kulaputtaṁ passeyyāsīti.
atk-s0510a42:5_19: Atha kho seṭṭhi gahapati ‘‘idheva kirāhaṁ nisinno idha nisinnaṁ yasaṁ kulaputtaṁ passissāmī’’ti haṭṭho
atk-s0510a42:5_21: ekamantaṁ nisinnassa kho seṭṭhissa gahapatissa bhagavā anupubbiṁ kathaṁ kathesi…pe…
atk-s0510a42:5_27: paṭicchannaṁ vā vivareyya mūḷhassa vā maggaṁ ācikkheyya,
atk-s0510a42:5_28: andhakāre vā telapajjotaṁ dhāreyya ‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti,
atk-s0510a42:5_29: evamevaṁ bhagavatā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito. Esāhaṁ, bhante,
atk-s0510a42:5_31: upāsakaṁ maṁ bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gata’’nti.
atk-s0510a42:5_32: Sova loke paṭhamaṁ upāsako ahosi tevāciko.
atk-s0510a42:6_0: Atha kho yasassa kulaputtassa pituno dhamme desiyamāne yathādiṭṭhaṁ yathāviditaṁ bhūmiṁ paccavekkhantassa anupādāya āyavehi cittaṁ vimucci.
atk-s0510a42:6_2: ‘‘yasassa kho kulaputtassa pituno dhamme desiyamāne yathādiṭṭhaṁ yathāviditaṁ bhūmiṁ paccavekkhantassa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuttaṁ,
atk-s0510a42:6_3: abhabbo kho yaso kulaputto hīnāyāvattitvā kāme paribhuñjituṁ,
atk-s0510a42:6_6: Atha kho bhagavā taṁ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṁ paṭippassambhesi.
atk-s0510a42:6_7: Addasā kho seṭṭhi gahapati yasaṁ kulaputtaṁ nisinnaṁ,
atk-s0510a42:6_12: Atha kho yaso kulaputto bhagavantaṁ ullokesi.
atk-s0510a42:6_13: Atha kho bhagavā seṭṭhiṁ gahapatiṁ etadavoca –
atk-s0510a42:6_15: yassa sekkhena ñāṇena sekkhena dassanena dhammo diṭṭho vidito seyyathāpi tayā,
atk-s0510a42:6_16: tassa yathādiṭṭhaṁ yathāviditaṁ bhūmiṁ paccavekkhantassa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuttaṁ,
atk-s0510a42:6_18: hīnāyāvattitvā kāme paribhuñjituṁ seyyathāpi pubbe agārikabhūto’’ti?
atk-s0510a42:6_21: kulaputtassa sekkhena ñāṇena sekkhena dassanena dhammo diṭṭho vidito seyyathāpi tayā,
atk-s0510a42:6_22: tassa yathādiṭṭhaṁ yathāviditaṁ bhūmiṁ paccavekkhantassa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuttaṁ,
atk-s0510a42:6_24: yaso kulaputto hīnāyāvattitvā kāme paribhuñjituṁ seyyathāpi pubbe agārikabhūto’’ti. ‘‘Lābhā, bhante,
atk-s0510a42:6_28: yathā yasassa kulaputtassa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuttaṁ,
atk-s0510a42:6_34: bhagavato adhivāsanaṁ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a42:6_35: Atha kho yaso kulaputto acirapakkante seṭṭhimhi gahapatimhi bhagavantaṁ etadavoca –
atk-s0510a42:7_1: Arahā pana hutvā somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṁ pakāsento mahāsamuddaṁ oggayhātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a42:7_2: Tattha samuddanti aṅgulimuddāya saṁ suṭṭhu dassetabbato samuddo,
atk-s0510a42:7_3: atha vā saṁ suṭṭhu udiyati khobhiyati pasodhiyati ghosanaṁ karonto āluḷiyatīti samuddo,
atk-s0510a42:7_4: mahanto ca so samuddo cāti mahāsamuddo,
atk-s0510a42:7_6: Oggayhāti ajjhogāhetvā abbhantaraṁ pavisitvā tassa mahāsamuddassa anto pavisitvā,
atk-s0510a42:7_8: Bhavanaṁ me sumāpitanti ettha bhavanti nibbattanti nivasanti catūhi iriyāpathehi vāsaṁ kappenti etthāti bhavanaṁ,
atk-s0510a42:7_9: mayhaṁ taṁ bhavanaṁ taṁ vimānaṁ taṁ pāsādaṁ pañcapākārakūṭāgārehi saṁ suṭṭhu māpitaṁ nagaraṁ,
atk-s0510a42:7_11: Sunimmitā pokkharaṇīti sumahantā hutvā bhūtā itā gatā pavattā khaṇitā katāti pokkharaṇī,
atk-s0510a42:7_13: Cakkavākūpakūjitāti cakkavākakukkuṭahaṁsādīhi kūjitā ghositā nāditā sā pokkharaṇīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a42:7_14: Ito paraṁ nadīvanadvipadacatuppadapādapapakkhīnaṁ vaṇṇañca sumedhassa bhagavato dassanañca nimantetvā
atk-s0510a42:8_1: kāmarūpārūpasaṅkhātassa lokassa āhutiṁ pūjāsakkāraṁ paṭiggaṇhātīti lokāhutipaṭiggahaṁ,
atk-s0510a42:11_0: Dutiyāpadāne padumuttarassa bhagavatotiādikaṁ āyasmato nadīkassapattherassa apadānaṁ.
atk-s0510a42:11_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a42:11_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ piṇḍāya carantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0510a42:11_3: attanā ropitassa ambarukkhassa paṭhamuppannaṁ manosilāvaṇṇaṁ ekaṁ ambaphalaṁ adāsi.
atk-s0510a42:11_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule uruvelakassapassa
atk-s0510a42:11_5: bhātā hutvā nibbatto vayappatto nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya gharāvāsaṁ anicchanto tāpasapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a42:11_6: tīhi tāpasasatehi saddhiṁ nerañjarāya nadiyā tīre assamaṁ māpetvā viharati.
atk-s0510a42:11_7: Nadītīre vasanato kassapagottatāya ca nadīkassapoti samaññā ahosi.
atk-s0510a42:11_8: Tassa bhagavā saparisassa ehibhikkhubhāvena upasampadaṁ adāsi.
atk-s0510a42:11_9: So bhagavato gayāsīse ādittapariyāya desanāya (mahāva. 54; saṁ. ni.
atk-s0510a42:12_1: satthā yasaṁ kulaputtaṁ pabbājetvā uruvelāyaṁ tayo bhātikajaṭile dametuṁ yena uruvelā tadavasari.
atk-s0510a42:12_2: Tena kho pana samayena uruvelāyaṁ tayo jaṭilā paṭivasanti uruvelakassapo nadīkassapo gayākassapoti,
atk-s0510a42:12_3: tesu uruvelakassapo jaṭilo pañcannaṁ jaṭilasatānaṁ nāyako hoti vināyako aggo pamukho pāmokkho,
atk-s0510a42:12_4: nadīkassapo jaṭilo tiṇṇaṁ jaṭilasatānaṁ nāyako hoti vināyako aggo pamukho pāmokkho,
atk-s0510a42:12_5: gayākassapo jaṭilo dvinnaṁ jaṭilasatānaṁ nāyako hoti vināyako aggo pamukho pāmokkho.
atk-s0510a42:12_6: Atha kho bhagavā yena uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa assamo tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a42:12_14: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā uruvelakassapaṁ jaṭilaṁ etadavoca…pe…
atk-s0510a42:12_22: Atha kho bhagavā agyāgāraṁ pavisitvā tiṇasanthārakaṁ paññapetvā nisīdi pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā.
atk-s0510a42:13_0: Addasā kho so nāgo bhagavantaṁ paviṭṭhaṁ,
atk-s0510a42:13_3: ‘‘yaṁnūnāhaṁ imassa nāgassa anupahacca chaviñca cammañca maṁsañca nhāruñca aṭṭhiñca aṭṭhimiñjañca tejasā tejaṁ pariyādiyeyya’’nti.
atk-s0510a42:13_4: Atha kho bhagavā tathārūpaṁ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkharitvā padhūpāyi.
atk-s0510a42:13_5: Atha kho so nāgo makkhaṁ asahamāno pajjali.
atk-s0510a42:13_7: Ubhinnaṁ sajotibhūtānaṁ agyāgāraṁ ādittaṁ viya hoti sampajjalitaṁ sajotibhūtaṁ.
atk-s0510a42:13_8: Atha kho te jaṭilā agyāgāraṁ parivāretvā evamāhaṁsu –
atk-s0510a42:13_11: Atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyā accayena tassa nāgassa anupahacca chaviñca cammañca maṁsañca nhāruñca
atk-s0510a42:13_12: aṭṭhiñca aṭṭhimiñjañca tejasā tejaṁ pariyādiyitvā patte pakkhipitvā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa dassesi –
atk-s0510a42:13_17: yatra hi nāma caṇḍassa nāgarājassa iddhimato āsivisassa ghoravisassa tejasā tejaṁ pariyādiyissati,
atk-s0510a42:13_18: na tveva kho arahā yathā aha’’nti.
atk-s0510a42:15_0: Sace te kassapa agaru, viharemu ajjaṇho aggisālamhī’’ti.
atk-s0510a42:16_0: ‘‘Na kho me mahāsamaṇa garu, phāsukāmova taṁ nivāremi;
atk-s0510a42:19_0: ‘‘Appeva maṁ na viheṭheyya, iṅgha tvaṁ kassapa anujānāhi agyāgāranti;
atk-s0510a42:20_0: Dinnanti naṁ viditvā, abhīto pāvisi bhayamatīto.
atk-s0510a42:27_0: Udicchare jaṭilā, abhirūpo vata bho mahāsamaṇo;
atk-s0510a42:29_0: ‘‘Atha tassā rattiyā accayena, hatā nāgassa acciyo honti;
atk-s0510a42:30_0: Iddhimato pana ṭhitā, anekavaṇṇā acciyo honti.
atk-s0510a42:34_0: Ayaṁ te kassapa nāgo, pariyādinno assa tejasā tejo’’ti.
atk-s0510a42:35_0: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo bhagavato iminā iddhipāṭihāriyena abhippasanno bhagavantaṁ etadavoca – ‘‘idheva,
atk-s0510a42:37_0: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa assamassa avidūre aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe vihāsi.
atk-s0510a42:37_1: Atha kho cattāro mahārājāno abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṁ vanasaṇḍaṁ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
atk-s0510a42:37_2: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā catuddisā aṭṭhaṁsu seyyathāpi mahantā aggikkhandhā.
atk-s0510a42:37_3: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a42:37_9: abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṁ vanasaṇḍaṁ obhāsetvā yena tvaṁ tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
atk-s0510a42:37_10: upasaṅkamitvā taṁ abhivādetvā catuddisā aṭṭhaṁsu seyyathāpi mahantā aggikkhandhā’’ti. Ete kho, kassapa,
atk-s0510a42:37_14: yatra hi nāma cattāropi mahārājāno upasaṅkamissanti dhammassavanāya,
atk-s0510a42:37_15: na tveva ca kho arahā yathā aha’’nti .
atk-s0510a42:37_16: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa bhattaṁ bhuñjitvā tasmiṁyeva vanasaṇḍe vihāsi.
atk-s0510a42:39_0: Atha kho sakko devānamindo abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṁ vanasaṇḍaṁ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a42:39_1: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi seyyathāpi mahāaggikkhandho purimāhi vaṇṇanibhāhi abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
atk-s0510a42:39_2: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a42:39_8: abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṁ vanasaṇḍaṁ obhāsetvā yena tvaṁ tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a42:39_9: upasaṅkamitvā taṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi seyyathāpi mahāaggikkhandho purimāhi vaṇṇanibhāhi abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā’’ti. Eso kho, kassapa,
atk-s0510a42:39_13: yatra hi nāma sakkopi devānamindo upasaṅkamissati dhammassavanāya,
atk-s0510a42:39_14: na tveva ca kho arahā yathā aha’’nti .
atk-s0510a42:39_15: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa bhattaṁ bhuñjitvā tasmiṁyeva vanasaṇḍe vihāsi.
atk-s0510a42:41_0: Atha kho brahmā sahampati abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṁ vanasaṇḍaṁ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a42:41_1: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi seyyathāpi mahāaggikkhandho purimāhi vaṇṇanibhāhi abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
atk-s0510a42:41_2: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a42:41_8: abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṁ vanasaṇḍaṁ obhāsetvā yena tvaṁ tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a42:41_9: upasaṅkamitvā taṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi seyyathāpi mahāaggikkhandho purimāhi vaṇṇanibhāhi abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā’’ti. Eso kho, kassapa,
atk-s0510a42:41_13: yatra hi nāma brahmāpi sahampati upasaṅkamissati dhammassavanāya,
atk-s0510a42:41_14: na tveva ca kho arahā yathā aha’’nti.
atk-s0510a42:41_15: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa bhattaṁ bhuñjitvā tasmiṁyeva vanasaṇḍe vihāsi.
atk-s0510a42:43_0: Tena kho pana samayena uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa mahāyañño paccupaṭṭhito hoti,
atk-s0510a42:43_1: kevalakappā ca aṅgamagadhā pahūtaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ ādāya abhikkamitukāmā honti.
atk-s0510a42:43_4: kevalakappā ca aṅgamagadhā pahūtaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ ādāya abhikkamissanti,
atk-s0510a42:43_9: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya uttarakuruṁ gantvā tato piṇḍapātaṁ
atk-s0510a42:43_10: āharitvā anotattadahe paribhuñjitvā tattheva divāvihāraṁ akāsi.
atk-s0510a42:43_11: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a42:43_20: khādanīyassa ca bhojanīyassa ca te paṭivīso ṭhapito’’ti. Nanu te, kassapa,
atk-s0510a42:43_22: ‘‘etarahi kho me mahāyañño paccupaṭṭhito kevalakappā ca aṅgamagadhā pahūtaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ ādāya abhikkamissanti,
atk-s0510a42:43_28: tava cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya uttarakuruṁ gantvā tato piṇḍapātaṁ āharitvā anotattadahe paribhuñjitvā tattheva divāvihāraṁ akāsinti.
atk-s0510a42:43_31: yatra hi nāma cetasāpi cittaṁ pajānissati,
atk-s0510a42:43_32: na tveva ca kho arahā yathā aha’’nti.
atk-s0510a42:43_33: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa bhattaṁ bhuñjitvā tasmiṁyeva vanasaṇḍe vihāsi.
atk-s0510a42:45_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavato paṁsukūlaṁ uppannaṁ hoti.
atk-s0510a42:45_3: Atha kho sakko devānamindo bhagavato cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya pāṇinā pokkharaṇiṁ khaṇitvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca – ‘‘idha,
atk-s0510a42:45_8: Atha kho sakko devānamindo bhagavato cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya mahatiṁ silaṁ upanikkhipi – ‘‘idha,
atk-s0510a42:45_13: Atha kho kakudhe adhivatthā devatā bhagavato cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya sākhaṁ onāmesi – ‘‘idha,
atk-s0510a42:45_18: Atha kho sakko devānamindo bhagavato cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya mahatiṁ silaṁ upanikkhipi – ‘‘idha,
atk-s0510a42:45_21: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a42:45_27: nāyaṁ pubbe idha pokkharaṇī sāyaṁ idha pokkharaṇī,
atk-s0510a42:45_31: sāyaṁ sākhā onatā’’ti? Idha me, kassapa,
atk-s0510a42:45_35: ‘‘kattha nu kho ahaṁ paṁsukūlaṁ dhoveyya’’nti? Atha kho, kassapa,
atk-s0510a42:45_36: sakko devānamindo mama cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya pāṇinā pokkharaṇiṁ khaṇitvā maṁ etadavoca – ‘‘idha,
atk-s0510a42:45_42: ‘‘kimhi nu kho ahaṁ paṁsukūlaṁ parimaddeyya’’nti? Atha kho, kassapa,
atk-s0510a42:45_43: sakko devānamindo mama cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya mahatiṁ silaṁ upanikkhipi – ‘‘idha,
atk-s0510a42:45_49: ‘‘kimhi nu kho ahaṁ ālambitvā uttareyya’’nti? Atha kho, kassapa,
atk-s0510a42:45_50: kakudhe adhivatthā devatā mama cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya sākhaṁ onāmesi – ‘‘idha,
atk-s0510a42:45_56: ‘‘kimhi nu kho ahaṁ paṁsukūlaṁ vissajjeyya’’nti? Atha kho, kassapa,
atk-s0510a42:45_57: sakko devānamindo mama cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya mahatiṁ silaṁ upanikkhipi – ‘‘idha,
atk-s0510a42:45_63: yatra hi nāma sakkopi devānamindo veyyāvaccaṁ karissati,
atk-s0510a42:45_64: na tveva ca kho arahā yathā aha’’nti.
atk-s0510a42:45_65: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa bhattaṁ bhuñjitvā tasmiṁyeva vanasaṇḍe vihāsi.

atk-s0510a42:50_0: Tena kho pana samayena te jaṭilā aggiṁ paricaritvā na sakkonti aggiṁ vijjhāpetuṁ.
atk-s0510a42:50_2: ‘‘nissaṁsayaṁ kho mahāsamaṇassa iddhānubhāvo yathā mayaṁ na sakkoma aggiṁ vijjhāpetu’’nti.
atk-s0510a42:50_3: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapaṁ jaṭilaṁ etadavoca –
atk-s0510a42:50_11: na tveva ca kho arahā yathā aha’’nti.
atk-s0510a42:51_0: Tena kho pana samayena te jaṭilā sītāsu hemantikāsu rattīsu antaraṭṭhakāsu himapātasamaye najjā nerañjarāya
atk-s0510a42:51_2: Atha kho bhagavā pañcamattāni mandāmukhisatāni abhinimmini yattha te jaṭilā uttaritvā visibbesuṁ.
atk-s0510a42:51_4: ‘‘nissaṁsayaṁ kho mahāsamaṇassa iddhānubhāvo yathayimā mandāmukhiyo nimmitā’’ti.
atk-s0510a42:51_7: yatra hi nāma tāva bahū mandāmukhiyopi abhinimminissati,
atk-s0510a42:51_8: na tveva ca kho arahā yathā aha’’nti.
atk-s0510a42:52_0: Tena kho pana samayena mahā akālamegho pāvassi,
atk-s0510a42:52_2: yasmiṁ padese bhagavā viharati so padeso udakena na otthaṭo hoti.
atk-s0510a42:52_4: ‘‘yaṁnūnāhaṁ samantā udakaṁ ussāretvā majjhe reṇuhatāya bhūmiyā caṅkameyya’’nti.
atk-s0510a42:52_5: Atha kho bhagavā samantā udakaṁ ussāretvā majjhe reṇuhatāya bhūmiyā caṅkami.
atk-s0510a42:52_6: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo ‘‘māheva kho mahāsamaṇo udakena vūḷho ahosī’’ti nāvāya sambahulehi jaṭilehi saddhiṁ yasmiṁ padese bhagavā viharati,
atk-s0510a42:52_8: Addasā kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo bhagavantaṁ samantā udakaṁ ussāretvā majjhe reṇuhatāya bhūmiyā caṅkamantaṁ,
atk-s0510a42:52_13: kassapā’’ti bhagavā vehāsaṁ abbhuggantvā nāvāya paccuṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a42:52_16: yatra hi nāma udakampi na pavāhissati,
atk-s0510a42:52_17: na tveva ca kho arahā yathā aha’’nti.
atk-s0510a42:53_1: ‘‘cirampi kho imassa moghapurisassa evaṁ bhavissati ‘mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo,
atk-s0510a42:53_2: na tveva ca kho arahā yathā aha’nti,
atk-s0510a42:53_4: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapaṁ jaṭilaṁ etadavoca –
atk-s0510a42:53_8: yāya tvaṁ arahā vā assasi arahattamaggaṁ vā samāpanno’’ti.
atk-s0510a42:53_9: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca –
atk-s0510a42:53_14: pañcannaṁ jaṭilasatānaṁ nāyako vināyako aggo pamukho pāmokkho,
atk-s0510a42:53_18: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo yena te jaṭilā tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a42:53_27: Atha kho te jaṭilā kesamissaṁ jaṭāmissaṁ khārikājamissaṁ aggihutamissaṁ udake pavāhetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
atk-s0510a42:53_28: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ –
atk-s0510a42:54_0: Addasā kho nadīkassapo jaṭilo kesamissaṁ jaṭāmissaṁ khārikājamissaṁ aggihutamissaṁ udake vuyhamāne,
atk-s0510a42:54_5: sāmañca tīhi jaṭilasatehi saddhiṁ yenāyasmā uruvelakassapo tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a42:54_11: Atha kho te jaṭilā kesamissaṁ jaṭāmissaṁ khārikājamissaṁ aggihutamissaṁ udake pavāhetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
atk-s0510a42:54_12: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ –
atk-s0510a42:55_0: Addasā kho gayākassapo jaṭilo kesamissaṁ jaṭāmissaṁ khārikājamissaṁ aggihutamissaṁ udake vuyhamāne,
atk-s0510a42:55_5: sāmañca dvīhi jaṭilasatehi saddhiṁ yenāyasmā uruvelakassapo tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a42:55_11: Atha kho te jaṭilā kesamissaṁ jaṭāmissaṁ khārikājamissaṁ aggihutamissaṁ udake pavāhetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
atk-s0510a42:55_12: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ –
atk-s0510a42:57_0: ‘‘Atha kho bhagavā uruvelāyaṁ yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā yena gayāsīsaṁ tena cārikaṁ pakkāmi mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena
atk-s0510a42:57_2: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā gayāyaṁ viharati gayāsīse saddhiṁ bhikkhusahassena.
atk-s0510a42:57_3: Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhu āmantesi (saṁ. ni. 4.28) – ‘sabbaṁ,
atk-s0510a42:57_11: yamidaṁ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā tampi ādittaṁ.
atk-s0510a42:57_14: jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi ādittanti vadāmi?
atk-s0510a42:57_27: yamidaṁ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā tampi ādittaṁ.
atk-s0510a42:57_30: jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi āditta’’’nti vadāmi.
atk-s0510a42:58_6: yamidaṁ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā tasmimpi nibbindati.
atk-s0510a42:58_19: yamidaṁ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā tasmimpi nibbindati.
atk-s0510a42:59_0: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṁ bhaññamāne tassa bhikkhusahassassa anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṁsu.
atk-s0510a42:60_1: Evaṁ ādittapariyāyadesanaṁ sutvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṁ sampatto nadīkassapo thero somanassajāto
atk-s0510a42:63_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ kusalaṁ upacinanto ito ekatiṁsakappe
atk-s0510a42:63_2: sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṁ patto nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya gharāvāsaṁ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṁ
atk-s0510a42:63_3: pabbajitvā araññāyatane assamaṁ māpetvā vanamūlaphalāhāro vasati.
atk-s0510a42:63_4: Tena ca samayena bhagavā eko adutiyo tassa assamasamīpenāgacchi,
atk-s0510a42:63_5: so bhagavantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṁ ṭhito velaṁ olokento manoharāni kolaphalāni satthu upanesi.
atk-s0510a42:63_6: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto
atk-s0510a42:63_7: nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya gharāvāsaṁ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā dvīhi tāpasasatehi saddhiṁ gayāya viharati.
atk-s0510a42:63_8: Gayāya vasanato hissa kassapagottatāya ca gayākassapoti samaññā ahosi.
atk-s0510a42:63_9: So bhagavato saddhiṁ parisāya ehibhikkhūpasampadaṁ datvā nadīkassapassa vuttanayena ādittapariyāya desanāya ovadiyamāno arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a42:64_1: So arahattaṁ patvā somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṁ pakāsento ajinacammavatthohantiādimāha .
atk-s0510a42:64_5: Kolaṁ ahāsi assamanti kolaphalaṁ assame pūretvā assame nisinnoti attho.
atk-s0510a42:64_6: Agopayinti pāṭhe kolaphalaṁ pariyesitvā assamaṁ gopesiṁ rakkhinti attho.
atk-s0510a42:67_0: Catutthāpadāne nibbute kakusandhamhītiādikaṁ āyasmato kimilattherassa apadānaṁ.
atk-s0510a42:67_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto kakusandhassa
atk-s0510a42:67_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto parinibbute satthari tassa dhātuyo uddissa salalamālāhi
atk-s0510a42:67_4: So tena puññakammena tāvatiṁsesu uppajjitvā aparāparaṁ devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kapilavatthunagare
atk-s0510a42:67_5: sakyarājakule nibbattitvā kimiloti tassa nāmaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0510a42:67_7: Tassa ñāṇaparipākaṁ ñatvā saṁvegajananatthaṁ anupiyāyaṁ viharanto satthā paṭhamayobbane ṭhitaṁ ramaṇīyaṁ
atk-s0510a42:67_8: itthirūpaṁ abhinimminitvā purato dassetvā puna anukkamena yathā jarārogavipattīhi abhibhūtā dissati,
atk-s0510a42:67_10: Taṁ disvā kimilakumāro ativiya saṁvegajāto attano saṁvegaṁ pakāsento bhagavato pākaṭaṁ katvā laddhānusāsano arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a42:68_1: So arahattaṁ patvā somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṁ pakāsento nibbute kakusandhamhītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a42:68_2: Brāhmaṇamhi vusīmatīti pañcahi vasitāhi vasippattamhi bhagavati.
atk-s0510a42:68_3: Brāhmaṇassa sabbaguṇagaṇehi maṇḍitattā abhivūḷhītattā brāhmaṇamhi kakusandhe bhagavati parinibbuteti attho.
atk-s0510a42:71_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ puññaṁ upacinanto ito catunavutikappe
atk-s0510a42:71_2: ekaṁ paccekabuddhaṁ bhikkhāya gacchantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso kadaliphalāni adāsi.
atk-s0510a42:71_3: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde vesāliyaṁ licchavirājakumāro hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0510a42:71_5: So daharo hutvā hatthisippādisikkhanakālepi hetusampannatāya nissaraṇajjhāsayova hutvā vicaranto satthu
atk-s0510a42:71_6: dhammadesanaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho satthu santike pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṁ katvā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0510a42:71_7: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā aparabhāge aciraparinibbute satthari dhammaṁ saṅgāyituṁ saṅketaṁ katvā mahātheresu
atk-s0510a42:71_8: tattha tattha viharantesu ekadivasaṁ āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ sekhaṁyeva samānaṁ mahatiyā parisāya parivutaṁ
atk-s0510a42:71_9: dhammaṁ desentaṁ disvā tassa uparimaggādhigamāya ussāhaṁ janento –
atk-s0510a42:73_0: Jhāya gotama mā ca pamādo, kiṁ te biḷibiḷikā karissatī’’ti. (theragā. 119) – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0510a42:74_5: tesu rukkhamūlaggahaṇena ṭhānassa chāyāya sampannatāya vātātapaparissayābhāvaṁ dīpeti,

atk-s0510a42:114_2: Adhiṭṭhānabalena sakalasarīradhātu ekaghanasilāmayapaṭimā viya ekameva ahosīti attho.
atk-s0510a42:114_3: Imamhi buddhathūpamhīti sakalajambudīpavāsīhi katamhi imamhi suvaṇṇathūpamhi mayaṁ sabbe samāgantvā kañcukathūpaṁ karissāmāti attho.
atk-s0510a42:115_1: Tato adhikavaṇṇatā mahāmaṇi indanīlamaṇayo ca mahānīlamaṇayo ca jotirasamaṇijātiraṅgamaṇayo ca ekato
atk-s0510a42:115_2: sannipātetvā rāsī katvā suvaṇṇathūpe kañcukathūpaṁ katvā achādayunti sambandho.
atk-s0510a42:116_0: 144.Paccekaṁbuddhaseṭṭhassāti buddhuttamassa pati ekaṁ visuṁ uparichadanena thūpaṁ akaṁsūti attho.
atk-s0510a42:117_0: 147.Kumbhaṇḍā guyhakātathāti kumbhamattāni aṇḍāni yesaṁ devānaṁ te kumbhaṇḍā,

atk-s0510a42:122_0: Ekādasamāpadāne padumuttarassa bhagavatotiādikaṁ āyasmato raṭṭhapālattherassa apadānaṁ.
atk-s0510a42:122_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a42:122_2: bhagavato kāle tassa uppattito puretarameva haṁsavatīnagare gahapatimahāsālakule nibbattitvā vayappatto
atk-s0510a42:122_3: pitu accayena gharāvāse patiṭṭhito ratanakoṭṭhāgārakammikena dassitaṁ aparimāṇaṁ kulavaṁsānugataṁ dhanaṁ
atk-s0510a42:122_4: disvā ‘‘imaṁ ettakaṁ dhanarāsiṁ mayhaṁ ayyakapayyakādayo attanā saddhiṁ gahetvā gantuṁ nāsakkhiṁsu,
atk-s0510a42:122_5: mayā pana gahetvā gantuṁ vaṭṭatī’’ti cintetvā kapaṇaddhikādīnaṁ mahādānaṁ deti.
atk-s0510a42:122_6: So abhiññālābhiṁ ekaṁ tāpasaṁ upaṭṭhahanto tena devalokādhipacce uyyojito yāvajīvaṁ puññāni katvā tato cuto devo hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0510a42:122_7: So tattha devaloke devarajjaṁ karonto yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā tato cuto manussaloke bhinnaṁ raṭṭhaṁ sandhāretuṁ
atk-s0510a42:122_9: Tena ca samayena padumuttaro nāma bhagavā loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko veneyyasattaṁ nibbānamahānagarasaṅkhātakhemantabhūmiṁ sampāpesi.
atk-s0510a42:122_10: Atha so kulaputto anukkamena viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ upāsakehi saddhiṁ vihāraṁ gato satthāraṁ dhammaṁ
atk-s0510a42:123_0: Tena ca samayena satthā ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ saddhāpabbajitānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi,
atk-s0510a42:123_1: taṁ disvā pasannamānaso tadatthāya cittaṁ ṭhapetvā satasahassabhikkhuparivārassa bhagavato mahatā sakkārena
atk-s0510a42:123_3: Satthā tassa anantarāyena ijjhanabhāvaṁ disvā ‘‘anāgate gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa sāsane saddhāpabbajitānaṁ aggo bhavissatī’’ti byākāsi.
atk-s0510a42:123_4: So satthāraṁ bhikkhusaṅghañca vanditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a42:123_5: So tattha yāvatāyukaṁ puññāni katvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto ito dvānavutikappe phussassa
atk-s0510a42:123_6: bhagavato kāle satthu vemātikabhātikesu tīsu rājaputtesu satthāraṁ upaṭṭhahantesu tesaṁ puññakiriyāya
atk-s0510a42:123_8: Evaṁ tattha tattha bhave taṁ taṁ bahuṁ kusalaṁ upacinitvā sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a42:123_10: tassa bhinnaṁ raṭṭhaṁ sandhāretuṁ samatthe kule nibbattattā raṭṭhapāloti vaṁsānugatameva nāmaṁ ahosi.
atk-s0510a42:123_11: So mahatā parivārena vaḍḍhanto anukkamena yobbanaṁ patto mātāpitūhi patirūpena dārena saṁyojetvā mahante
atk-s0510a42:123_12: ca yase patiṭṭhāpito dibbasampattisadisaṁ sampattiṁ paccanubhoti.
atk-s0510a42:123_13: Atha bhagavā kururaṭṭhe janapadacārikaṁ caranto thullakoṭṭhikaṁ anupāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a42:123_14: Taṁ sutvā raṭṭhapālo kulaputto satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā satthu santike dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0510a42:123_15: sattavāre bhattacchede katvā kicchena kasirena mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṁ
atk-s0510a42:123_16: yācitvā satthu āṇattiyā aññatarassa therassa santike pabbajitvā yonisomanasikārena kammaṁ karonto vipassanaṁ
atk-s0510a42:124_1: Athāyasmā aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṁ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṁ pakāsento padumuttarassa bhagavatotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a42:124_2: Sunāgo so mayā dinnoti tadā mahādhanaseṭṭhi hutvā sabbaṁ sāpateyyaṁ dānamukhe vissajjanasamaye sattappatiṭṭho
atk-s0510a42:124_3: sundaro nāgo hatthirājā mayā dinno ahosi.
atk-s0510a42:124_12: Itthambhūto hatthināgo padumuttarassa bhagavato mayā dinnoti attho.
atk-s0510a42:125_0: 181.Mayā bhattaṁ kāretvānāti mayā kārāpitavihāre vasantānaṁ koṭisaṅkhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ niccabhattaṁ paṭṭhapetvā mahesino niyyādesinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a42:126_0: 183.Jalajuttamanāmakoti jalato jāto jalajo, kiṁ taṁ? Padumaṁ,
atk-s0510a42:126_1: padumena samānanāmattā uttamattā ca padumuttaro nāma bhagavāti attho.
atk-s0510a42:132_0: Sīhaḷadīpake appicchatādiguṇavantānaṁ theravaṁsappadīpānaṁ ānandattherādīnaṁ sabbasattānaṁ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhādayo
atk-s0510a42:132_1: chedananiggahavivecanādyatthaṁ sattahi māsehi ativiya ārādhanena laddhakosallena bodhisambhāraṁ gavesantena
atk-s0510a42:132_2: satidhitigativīriyaparakkamantena mahāsamantaguṇasobhanena tipiṭakadharena paṇḍitena ābhataṁ imaṁ apadāna-aṭṭhakathaṁ
atk-s0510a42:133_0: Anena lobhādimalā pajānaṁ, cakkhādirogā vividhā ca dukkhā;
atk-s0510a42:134_0: Kalahādibhayā dukkhitā jātā, corādayonatthakarā ca loke.
atk-s0510a42:135_0: Nassantu me pañca verā ca pāpā, nassantu gimhe yathā vuṭṭhivātā;
atk-s0510a42:140_0: Sabbe dhammānuyāyantu, tayo lokā utupi cāti.
